remarks: Elementhood in the domain of the adjoint function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Dec-2016.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
adjeu $p |- ( T : ~H --> ~H -> ( T e. dom adjh <-> E! u e. ( ~H ^m ~H ) A. x e. ~H A. y e. ~H ( x .ih ( T ` y ) ) = ( ( u ` x ) .ih y ) ) ) $.
$d T u x y $.
